ygData.subject: RE: Rebreathers...
ygData.msgSnippet: I doubt they will reduce the wieght. Have you ever tried scuba diving the equipment is heavy and bulky out of water and even more so with Rebreather equipment.
ygData.messageBody:
I doubt they will reduce the wieght. Have you ever tried scuba diving the
equipment is heavy and bulky out of water and even more so with Rebreather
equipment.

Mithadris Midas

-----Original Message-----
From: sragan@... [mailto:sragan@...]
Sent: Monday, December 27, 1999 7:37 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreathers...


From: sragan@...


Dont forget to do a "/feedback" and tell Verant they need to reduce the
weigh of the lungs and rebreathers.

As I figured, after I maxed on stalking probes at 102, I had to cycle about
40,000 plat thru the skill to get to the point where rebreathers can be made
with a tolerable success rate.

My skill is 127 at the moment and my success rate for rebreathers is 1 out
of 3. I am trying to sell them for 3250 on tunare.

Cheers FizzWizz

P.S. To the guy that asked where all the component are for the lungs and
rebreathers, check in the back of the necro guild in akanon, you should find
a vendor in there somewhere...heh-heh...
